title: Coffee with Creatives
short_description: Free Event! Uncle Strawberry is a St. Louis based artist. Strawberry’s work explicitly references pop culture’s relationship to Generation Y, the largest cohort since the baby boomers. Join him for coffee to chat about his approach to art, social media promotion, and more!
long_description:
Uncle Strawberry is a St. Louis based artist. Strawberry’s work explicitly references pop culture’s relationship to Generation Y, the largest cohort since the baby boomers. Using cartoons characters as muses, Strawberry examines the sophistication of the millennials as it relates to technology and they’re immunity to traditional marketing methods having been exposed to it during childhood through animation, and entertainment.

His work, nostalgic and sometimes satirical, remind us of a time filled with cereal commercials and gaudy action figures, a time when television ratings systems were introduced to prevent children who never wanted to grow up at all from growing up too fast.

Instagram handle: @uncle_strawberry 

Topics

  1. The process when it comes to creating a new piece
  2. Working with different mediums.
  3. Knowing when and how to create a unique style of painting.
  4. Some inspirations and people you look up to.
  5. How to sell work online and expose yourself to social media
  6. How does social media help move paintings
  7. Painting for a gallery vs painting a commissioned piece  

Send us your email address to get on our A-List mailer for the latest in bookings and event info.
